name: Make It Count (TeamChimera)
description:
There is Guitar Hero, DJ Hero, Frets on Fire, but nothing has anything on Make it Count. Make it Count is a VR (Oculus only) experience for those who like a challenge. Put as many objects into the container before the music stops and see if you can win.  Only those with the best memory will prevail!

There are two modes - normal and crazy because there is no in-between.

Player Controls

Right Trigger and Thumbstick - UI interaction

Grip (both controllers) - Grab Objects

R - to reset the game

Esc - to quit

Warning: This game contains flashing lights and my trigger certain epileptic seizures or blackouts  for some individuals.

***Disclaimer: Developed and tested using a 2080 NVIDA graphics card. There may be a drop in frame rate on earlier/other graphic card models. However, there is an option to reduce the quality (removing volumetric fog that makes the game smoother but not as cool ;-) )

--------------

Game Jam Criteria

Created for the Unreal Engine Summer Game Jam 2019 #ue4jam

All assets (except music) have been created during the game jam.

The game is under 100MB and has been developed for VR (Oculus Rift and works with Oculus Rift S).
